originalText.text: Dr. Heller was so great, I just had my first visit with severe neck pain and he was able to fit me in the day I reached out. He is very friendly and approachable. I am looking forward to continuing with him! I feel so lucky to have found him!

originalText.text: Dr. Heller is the BEST! Not only a kind human but an amazing chiropractor. He really cares. I have enjoyed every visit over the past few years and I feel so lucky to have found Dr. Heller!

text.text: Dr. Heller is the BEST! Not only a kind human but an amazing chiropractor. He really cares. I have enjoyed every visit over the past few years and I feel so lucky to have found Dr. Heller!

originalText.text:
I am incredibly grateful for the outstanding care provided by Dr. Jay Heller during my visits. His expertise and compassionate approach relieved me significantly from chronic TMJ and neck pain. Dr. Heller's understanding of the musculoskeletal system allowed him to diagnose and address the root causes of my condition. He explains things so you can understand his comprehensive approach to healing through personalized treatment.

Dr. Heller's treatment was remarkably effective, and I experienced noticeable improvements after just a few sessions. His gentle yet precise adjustments, combined with his attention to detail, resulted in significant pain reduction. His expertise and compassionate approach make him an outstanding chiropractor. I am grateful for his help and its positive impact on my well-being.

originalText.text:
I have been looking for a chiropractor now for a few years since my original one moved away.  To say my search was futile is an understatement; that is until now.  I just got back from my first appointment from Dr Jay Heller and I literally feel so much better.  His combination of adjustment and electric stimulation really helped me a lot.  I'm not pain free, but I am much better than when I walked in.  He definitely made a difference.
Thank you Dr Heller

originalText.text: Dr. Heller is truly the best, I refer everyone I know to him. He makes such a difference in my life; a quick visit is instant relief. I have tons of stiffness from sitting at a computer all day every day for so many years and have seen other chiropractors that rush and are way too rough. He can always fit me into his schedule, he really listens, and I leave feeling like I’m walking on a cloud. Honestly can not say enough wonderful things!
